cleaned_text: Tai Chi: Moving for Better Balance Robert Nations MS, L.Ac. CharacteristicsA series of individual forms linked together one continuous, circular, on Yang, Sun, Wu(Jian Qian, He Qin)Modied Yang style - From 108 to 24 to 8 forms allows for more participation and Trial: Li et 24 vs. Low Impact ExercisesFindings Reduced frequency of falls among Chi participantsReduced of falls by 55 percentImproved balanceReduced fear of falling Why Tai wks = $2325Instructor Training CDPHContactsRachel Zerbo, MPH, CA Department of Public Health - Instructor/Leader Training rachel.zerbo@cdph.ca.govRobert Nations, MS, L.Ac., Pacic College of Oriental Medicine - Tai Chi: Moving for Better Balance nations.robert@gmail.comEmily Nabors, MSG, University
